EmailTemplate.name: Renewal is Withdrawn
EmailTemplate.subject: Your ORMS Renewal has been Withdrawn
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.Primary_Contact__c},
Your renewal application has been withdrawn.
Please reach out to {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName}, your Account Executive, if you wish to restart the renewal process, he is here to help you. His direct contact information is below:
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} {!Opportunity.OwnerTitle} {!Opportunity.OwnerPhone} {!Opportunity.OwnerEmail}
At any time you can reach our dedicated team through email at: ORMSSupport@onereverse.com Or by phone at: #888-980-2989.
We are excited to provide the best mortgage experience to you and your clients! If you wish to restart your renewal, please get back to us.
Respectfully, ORMS Credit Risk Management
